337410.name: Karos
337410.description:
Karos: Rebirth is a classic MMORPG full of adventures, freedom, and epic battles in the magical world of Azmara. Explore diverse landscapes, uncover hidden dungeons, help the locals, and challenge ancient monsters. Every step is a new story, every battle — a chance to prove your strength.

In Azmara, you don’t have to follow a strict path. Play the way you want! Battle other players in PvP arenas, defend your guild’s honor in massive castle sieges, gather rare resources, or focus on crafting. You earn experience and rewards simply by playing the way you enjoy most.

Create your own unique hero by choosing from 4 races, 7 classes, and 42 professions. Master the Fletta System — an ancient magic that enhances your skills and equipment, making your character truly one of a kind.

Customize your hero with costumes, wings, pets, and mounts to express your style. Each new item unlocks fresh customization options — mix and match to create a look that’s uniquely yours.

Become a part of a living world: join guilds, take part in large-scale castle and mine sieges, and earn valuable resources and fame. Across all servers, you’ll find an active community and endless opportunities to start your adventure.

Karos: Rebirth is a world where victory depends not only on strength but also on strategy. Easy to start, yet deep enough for those who seek mastery — it’s a true MMORPG experience.

Key Features

  • Free-to-play MMORPG with a player-driven auction — earn premium items without spending real money.

  • Unique Fletta System — empower your character through mystical energy.

  • Massive PvP and PvE battles: from duels to castle sieges with hundreds of participants.

  • 4 races, 7 classes, 42 professions, and 12 super skills — choose your own combat style.

  • Advanced crafting system — forge powerful equipment with your own hands.

  • Transforming mounts that become part of your armor when inactive.

  • Regular events and updates, supported by an active, passionate community.
337410.supported_languages:
俄语*, 德语*, 土耳其语*, 英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 法语*, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
